item.title: Stable Diffusion Scripts
item.description: Data Grooming Numbering PNG files in a folder in sequence 1import os 2import pathlib 3 4try: 5 collection = os.getcwd() 6 num_files_renamed = 0 7 for i, filename in enumerate(os.listdir(collection)): 8 file_extension = pathlib.Path(filename).suffix 9 if file_extension == ".png" or file_extension == ".jpg": 10 new_filename = f"{str(i).zfill(5)}.png" 11 old_path = os.path.join(collection, filename) 12 new_path = os.path.join(collection, new_filename) 13 os.rename(old_path, new_path) 14 num_files_renamed += 1 15 print(f"Renamed file {filename} to {new_filename}") 16 print(f"Renamed {num_files_renamed} files.
